Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Map/domainX

Function map[&K, &V] domainX(map[&K, &V] M, set[&K] S)
Description Return the map M restricted to pairs with key not in S.
Examples 
rascal>import Map;
ok
rascal>domainX(("apple": 1, "pear": 2, "ananas": 3), {"apple", "pear"});
map[str, int]: ("ananas":3)
